name: WAKFU – Zinit Pack
detailed_description:
Be ready to face the World of Twelve with exclusive and powerful items!
*Be careful, this DLC pack can be activated only once per player account in WAKFU.

The Zinit Pack includes:

- 30 days of Booster benefits
• +30% XP points in combat and quests
• +10% chance to drop items at the end of combats
• +30% Kamas at the end of the combat
• Exclusive early access to latest areas and content
• Secondary characters get an XP bonus according to main character level
• Fill your health with one click
• Vote for governor’s elections

- 2 heroes for 30 days
Play with two additional characters from your account.


- Otomai Costume
The Twelvian program "we've exchanged our HP" gives you the chance to step into the shoes (or rather the unwashed clothes) of Otomai, the famous alchemist, for surprising immersion!

- Emote: Climb Mount Zinit
Scale Mount Zinit? It's in the bag!

- Title: Zinitude
A title for those who've chosen the Zinitude Attitude by walking on the beaches of Mount Zinit.

- 1 Mimisymbic v2
The Mimisymbic lets you give an item the appearance of another item that's the same type.
Be careful: the item whose appearance is transferred is destroyed during fusion.

- 5 Vital Energy Cocktails
This cocktail gives you back all your Vitality.

- 5 Prospecting Flasks
This potion increases your Prospecting by 40 for several fights. It can be consumed multiple times to increase the number of fights.

- 5 Wisdom Flasks
This potion increases your Wisdom (XP gain) by 40 for several fights. It can be consumed multiple times to increase the number of fights.


How to redeem:
To get all the content of your Zinit Pack once you’ve purchased it with your Steam Wallet:
- Enter your 15 characters code on the WAKFU website! www.wakfu.com
- Then, you just have to confirm at the bottom of the redeem page.

short_description: The Zinit Pack includes 30 days of Booster benefits, 2 heroes for 30 days, the Otomai Costume, the "Climb Mount Zinit" Emote, the Zinitude title, 1x Mimisymbic v2, 5x Vital Energy Cocktails, 5x Prospecting Flasks, 5x Wisdom Flasks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
